Html:
Hi Jaimie

Great work so far on this!

I was wondering if you'd look at implementing methods to trigger Workflows using ExecuteWorkflowRequest or launching dialogs?

Andy

Hi Andy.

I don't have plans to add methods to launch dialog, forms as it seems the SDK has already included them or will include them. The following example is from SDK 5.0.14
function openDialogProcess(dialogId,entityName,objectId)
{
var url = Xrm.Page.context.getClientUrl() + "/cs/dialog/rundialog.aspx?DialogId=" +
dialogId + "&EntityName=" + entityName + "&ObjectId=" + objectId;
window.open(url);
}
Trigging a workflow may be added but not in the coming release 1.4.1 ( Current plan for 1.4.1 is around the middle of April )

Hope this clears some questions.

Jaimie
